name: Microsoft Word HTML Document Template
summary: Learn about .DOTHTML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Word no longer supports the DOTHTML format. Instead of saving documents as DOTHTML files, Word supports saving them as .MHTML and .MHT files, which are more widely supported by web browsers and other programs.

To create a webpage version of your template in Word 365, select File â†’ Save As, then choose the "Single File Web Page (*.mht, *.mhtml)" option from the dropdown menu. You can also choose to save your document as an .HTM or .HTML file.

description: A DOTHTML file is a Microsoft Word template document saved in HTML version. It can be opened in web browser and contents are displayed as any other web page. DOTHTML files are generated from Microsoft Word .DOT files that contain pre-formatted settings for generating these files. When a DOT file is converted to DOCHTML, all these settings are retained and the converted DOTHTML file is displayed with similar formatting as the original DOT file. This way, published templates can be viewed in web browser.

A DOTHTML file is an HTML version of a .DOT file created with Microsoft Word, a word processing application. It contains HTML source code that can be used to display the document with similar formatting to the original DOT file. DOTHTML files are used for viewing published templates in a web browser.

instructions: Unfortunately, there are no known applications that fully support the DOTHTML format since Microsoft Word dropped support for it.
